name: One Hell of a Show
description:
Team PoroPower! (ToJam2021)

In hell, the new hip shows that are too die for "One Hell of a Show". The show makes the contestant uses his emotion too survive the optical course and if he entertaining enough he gets to do it again! but with more feeling this time.  

The contestant has 4 power: 

sadness: (extra life) 

Fear: (run fast)

Happyness: (double jump)

Anger: (allows to punch)

The game was created by:

Philippe Turcot-Roy Game designer https://philippetr.itch.io/ https://philippeturcot-roy.portfolio.site/ Kévin Duguay  programmer  http://kevinduguay.ca/fr/projets   https://itch.io/profile/ertsnom99 Émilie Frappier programmer  https://popcorns.itch.io/ Jimmy Lim  programmer https://jimmyetlim.itch.io/ Jordan Dion-Duval 
Artisthttps://www.artstation.com/jordanddJames Stajov
